document.full_text: the drone aircraft attack that killed two midlevel al qaeda militants in yemen on thursday was targeting the leader of al qaeda in the arabian peninsula, a u.s.-born radical known for encouraging attacks on the united states, u.s. media reported.
document.title: u.s. drone in yemen missed al qaeda's al-awlaki: report
lines_and_colors: the drone aircraft attack that killed two midlevel al qaeda militants in yemen on thursday was targeting the leader of al qaeda in the arabian peninsula, a u.s.-born radical known for encouraging attacks on the united states, u.s. media reported.
